summary: The bill, the Joint Task Force to Counter Illicit Synthetic Narcotics Act of 2025, establishes a Joint Task Force (JTF-ISN) to combat the opioid crisis. The JTF-ISN will be composed of representatives from various federal agencies. The Director, appointed by the President, will report to the Attorney General, submit regular reports to Congress, and direct counter-opioid activities, including investigations, strategic coordination, and joint operations. The JTF-ISN is authorized to investigate and prosecute violations of federal law related to illicit synthetic narcotics trafficking, with a focus on disrupting trafficking networks.
